title: VA-MOS_Presents_80s_Groove_Volume_II-3CD-2011-H3X
description:
The 3CD collection is jam-packed with more cool credible dance floor anthems from Chaka Kahn, Nu-Shooz, George Benson, classic funky soulful grooves from the outstanding Earth, Wind & Fire, The Jacksons and Heatwave plus the smooth sexy tones of Sade, Luther Vandross and Marvin Gaye, released by H3X.
